name: SMSheet
description: Log Twilio SMS to a Google Spreadsheet

GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: A Google server to server API service account ID

GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Google server to server API private key

GOOGLE_SHEET_ID.description: The ID of a Google spreadsheet

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: identifies your requests from Twilio webhook

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: identifies your requests from Twilio webhook
